--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--incrementalVariableCostImpactDescripti: Costs that fluctuate with production volumes - includes, raw materials / inventory , utilities, etc
--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--variableCostImpactDescription--: Variable costs increase or decrease depending on production or sales volume
--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--variableCostVolumeDescription--: Variable costs  adds the ability to enter quantity/price difference to calculate KPI actual
--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--incrementalCM1ImpactDescription--: Incremental money generated for each unit sold after deducting variable portion of the firm's costs.
--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--incrementalOperationalLeaseImpactDescr: A contract that permits use of an asset without transferring ownership rights of said asset
--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--incrementalFixedCostImpactDescription-: Costs that does not fluctuate with production volume, such as rent, overhead etc.
--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--oneTimeCostImpactDescription--: A non-recurring fee associated with cost of production.
--kpiBreakdownLabel--.--capExImpactDescription--: Represents the cost to company to acquire, upgrade and maintain physical assets, including a depreciation value associated with the asset.

--addNewKPIAndStartTracking--: Add a new KPI and start tracking your EBIT impact!
--estimatedUsefulLifeForCapexProject--: Estimated useful life for CAPEX Project (Years):
--deleteBreakdownConfirmation--: Are you sure you want to delete {{breakdown}}? Any changes made to the KPI will be lost
